DOC.brief_summary: The objective study 1 . ) evaluate pain relief follow application Bioskin Ten-7 knee brace 2 . ) determine use Bioskin Ten-7 knee brace effective reduce inflammation standard care alone use synovial fluid cytokine analysis validate outcome measure .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Bioskin Ten-7 vs. Standard Treatment Patient Reported Outcomes Cytokine .
DOC.detailed_description: Once consent , patient assign either Group A Group B . Group A patient receive standard treatment prescribe knee brace . Group B patient receive standard treatment Bioskin Ten-7 knee brace . On Day 0 , patient assign one 2 group use 1:1 assignment . VAS , WOMAC , Oxford Knee Score , KOOS questionnaires administer sample patient 's synovial fluid send labs cytokine cell count analysis . All patient record use NSAIDs Group B , start end time brace use record . All patient return 8 week assess efficacy treatment . All patient return diary , complete validate outcome measure Day 0 undergo repeat synovial fluid analysis .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year old primary diagnosis Knee OA knee diagnosis . Must telephone access .
